creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: ten total lines, on every other panel section; last two lines written much smaller; dark border at top and bottom edges; fully mounted to jet black board; two small square relief stamps LLC; small rectangular relief stamp URC
markings: URC, rectangular relief; L center, small square relief stamp; LLC, small square relief stamp; on back of mount, center, in red: [Kansai]
title: Things Seen at a River Village
